author: A_Brickset_user
title: working class hero
review: yeah, this one also comes with an extra tree, tools and a roadsign. the driver has this oldfashioned yellow west, but always smiles though work may be hard. only the decals suck, they are simply unnecessary.

author: Minifig_Man
title: Great parts, great play value
review:
This set had a lot of firsts for me. My first tree, my first traffic sign and the first time I learned about offsetting studs (the engine).

The set has great play value, offloading the trailer, getting to work and then packing it all up again.

What am I still doing here writing about it? I'm going to rebuild it!
